channel.title: Wolfram Language
channel.description:
I know a lot of people know about Wolfram Alpha, but I personally had no idea that the language behind it was so vast...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_P9HqHVPeik [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_P9HqHVPeik]Link for those who have the video scripts blocked[/url] I think it's pretty amazing
